Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Senior Resident Posts.
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 11:56 IST
 District Health Society
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 67,700 to 106,000




FOLLOW

The Chandigarh Administration has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their DNB, MS/MD can apply for the Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Chandigarh.

Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Senior Resident	03	MD/MS, DNB

Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 Age Limit;

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 67,700/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,06,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Chandigarh Administration Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Room No. 24 M S Office, Govt Multi-Speciality Hospital, Sector 16, Chandigarh.

Important Dates:

Starting date	07-08-2025
Closing date	12-08-2025
